title: My screen turns black whenever i join a league game?!?!?!
body: For the past few days i haven't been able to play on league of legends for some reason? When ever i join a game my screen turns black and i cant play.

replies.body:
It sounds like League could be having a hard time interacting with your graphics hardware. This could be caused by a bad driver or windows power settings. We've got the most frequent solutions inside our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), so I recommend starting there.

Let me know if those steps resolved the issue.

Hello,
The following steps that you have showed me haven't resolved the problem and i just want to play, i havnt been able to play in two days please figure it out for me.

Since those steps didn't resolve the issue, we'll need to take a look at your system logs in order to further troubleshoot this. I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it will expedite your service.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello once again,
none of these things worked...what is wrong why is this happening to me!?!?! I just would like to play but thank your for your time and service
You had trouble obtaining logs and submitting a ticket? Can you let me know where you experienced problems so I can assist you?
i couldn't find the logs and  i already submitted a ticket.
